Description:
Work at Height Regulations 2005, Regulation 4(1)(a) – I approve this on the basis that the defendant company should have planned the work at height. The planning which had been done was well below the expected standard.
Work at Height Regulations 2005, Regulation 6(3) – I approve this on the basis that the defendant company should have put in suitable & sufficient measures to prevent a person falling from the over roof. Inadequate measures had been taken which led to the IP suffering significant injuries after falling from the roof.
